reviewText: Marcus does a great job from giving the history to the techniques of playing the pandeiro. He is clear and concise. I would highly recommend this DVD.

I found this DVD a very good introduction to this fantastic Brazilian music instrument and how I can play different styles of rhythms on this hand drum the pandeiro. From samba to funky rhythms and more. A great Brazilian instrument!!

I love everything about this course. From the history of the Brazilian Pandeiro, to the actual playing lessons, everything is clear and enjoyable. Marcus Santos is a great player (I saw him live many times) and an excellent teacher. Highly recommended.
